title: Sad moment when 47 Minute game
body: And didn't notice our Varus was AP until after the game.

replies.body: That awareness, might be something you want to work on :D AP Varus is close to viability right now though, just needs some AP ratio buffs. Guinsoo's OP
I mean i don't really think that means AP Varus is viable at all, that just means the item is still broken.
